TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class ExpressionTextBox : System.Windows.Controls.UserControl, System.Windows.Markup.IComponentConnector

Public NotInheritable Class ExpressionTextBox Inherits UserControl Implements IComponentConnector
public ref class ExpressionTextBox sealed : System::Windows::Controls::UserControl, System::Windows::Markup::IComponentConnector
type ExpressionTextBox = class inherit UserControl interface IComponentConnector

summary.span: 描述可讓使用者在活動設計工具中編輯運算式的控制項。

span.span: Describes a control that enables the user to edit an expression in an activity designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Visual Studio 中，編輯運算式時，提供功能，例如 IntelliSense。In Visual Studio, the provides features such as IntelliSense when editing an expression. 這類功能是由稱為可裝載編輯器的元件所提供。Such features are provided by a component called the hostable editor. 運算式編輯介面是可擴充的，而且您可以取代用於編輯運算式的編輯器。The expression editing interface is extensible and the editor used for editing expressions can be replaced. > [!NOTE] > 這個元件不適用於 Visual Studio 外部重新裝載的應用程式中使用。This component is not available for use in applications that are being re-hosted outside Visual Studio. **ExpressionTextBlock**當您編輯運算式時，以下列方式運作。**ExpressionTextBlock** works in the following manner when you edit an expression. 1. 當您按一下**ExpressionTextBox**、會建立物件，並可裝載編輯器工作階段會在 Visual Studio 中具現化。When you click on an **ExpressionTextBox**, an object is created and a hostable editor session is instantiated in Visual Studio. 2. 當您在可裝載編輯器內部輸入時，請注意，這些功能具有兩種可用性。When you type inside a hostable editor, note that the features have two sorts of availability. 1. IntelliSense、完成和顏色標示支援會立即可用。IntelliSense, completion and colorization support is available immediately. 2. 驗證則是在背景呼叫，而且只有在經過一段短暫的時間間隔之後才能使用。Validation is called in the background and is available only after a short interval of time elapses. 然後，如果您的運算式無效，裝載的編譯器就會回報錯誤，而且運算式右邊會顯示紅色的錯誤圖示。Then, if your expression is invalid, the hosted compiler reports the error and the red error icon displays to the right of your expression. 3. 按下**Enter**金鑰時**ExpressionTextBox**插入新行中的取得焦點物件。Press the **Enter** key when the **ExpressionTextBox** has the focus to insert new lines in the object. 這樣做會導致系統在可裝載編輯器內部進行行認可，進而觸發美化排列以及不規則曲線的顯示。This causes a line commit to occur inside the hostable editor, which triggers a pretty listing and the display of squiggles. 4. 終結編輯器執行個體時**ExpressionTextBox**失去焦點時，並顯示還原到**TextBlock**。The editor instance is destroyed when the **ExpressionTextBox** loses the focus, and the display reverts to a **TextBlock**. 如果您正在設計工具介面上或在屬性方格中，系統就會認可模型項目的變更，而且顯示相同運算式的所有 控制項都會進行同步處理。If you are on the designer surface or in the property grid, the change to the model item is committed and all controls displaying that same expression are synchronized. 不過，如果您正在對話方塊中，系統就會等到您按一下 [確定] 之後，才認可模型項目的變更。However, if you are in a dialog box, the change to the model item is not committed until you click OK. 認可模型項目時，系統會叫用 並且驗證整個工作流程。When the model item is committed, is invoked and the entire workflow is validated. 5. 當您按一下**ExpressionTextBox**同樣地，建立新的編輯器執行個體。When you click on the **ExpressionTextBox** again, a new editor instance is created. 在可裝載編輯器中，美化排列、顏色標示和不規則曲線都會在您開始編輯之前進行。In the hostable editor, pretty listing, colorization, and squiggling occurs before you begin editing. 若要繫結運算式的文字方塊中，若要**OwnerActivity**，使用正確設定資料內容。To bind the expression text box to **OwnerActivity**, use to set the data context correctly. 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定繫結至正確的資料內容**OwnerActivity**。The following code sample demonstrates setting the data context correctly for binding to **OwnerActivity**. ``` ``` 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 與 。For more information, see and . 另請參閱[自訂活動設計工具中使用 ExpressionTextBox](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-expressiontextbox-in-a-custom-activity-designer.md)範例主題。Also see the [Using the ExpressionTextBox in a Custom Activity Designer](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-expressiontextbox-in-a-custom-activity-designer.md) sample topic. ## Examples 通常是在建立自訂活動設計工具時以宣告方式使用。The is usually used declaratively when creating custom activity designers. 範例程式碼，請參閱[ExpressionTextBox101](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=193145)部落格。For sample code, see the [ExpressionTextBox101](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=193145) blog.

summary.span: 發生於運算式編輯器失去邏輯焦點時。

span.span: Occurs when the expression editor loses logical focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用方法呼叫刻意強制焦點，但上一個鍵盤焦點存在於不同範圍中，則邏輯焦點會與鍵盤焦點不同。Logical focus differs from keyboard focus if focus is deliberately forced away by using a method call but the previous keyboard focus exists in a different scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一律為必要項。 is always required. 使用時以宣告方式繫結至引數，您必須一律使用繫結運算式的引數中，然後再設定`ConverterParameter`要`In`或`Out`根據引數的方向。When using the declaratively to bind to arguments, you must always use the to bind the expression to the argument, setting the `ConverterParameter` to `In` or `Out` depending on the direction of the argument.

summary.span: 取得或設定運算式型別。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 強烈建議您設定此型別。Setting the type is strongly recommended. 如果您沒有設定 ，就無法使用 來繫結至委派型別，而且無法向裝載的編譯器取得驗證。If you do not set , you can’t use the to bind to delegate types and you do not get validation from the hosted compiler. 這個編譯器驗證會檢查所輸入之運算式的類型是否符合預期的類型，並顯示周圍的紅色方塊**ExpressionTextBox**無效的資料輸入到其中的活動設計工具時。This compiler validation checks to see if the type of the entered expression matches the expected type, and displays a red box around the **ExpressionTextBox** when invalid data is entered into it on an activity designer.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseLocationExpression { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseLocationExpression : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會判斷此執行個體是否使用位置運算式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether this instance uses the location expression.

value.span: 如果此執行個體使用位置運算式，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if this instance uses the location expression; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A*位置運算式*（或左值運算式） 是一種運算式，評估為識別碼，並可放置在左手邊的指派陳述式。A *location expression* (or L-value expression) is a type of expression that evaluates to an identifier and can be placed on the left hand side of an assignment statement. 當您要繫結要`Out`引數，您會設定這個屬性為`True`。When you are binding the to an `Out` argument, you would set this property to `True`.
